CustomField.formula: IF( Total_Purchased_VG_Count__c > 0, IF( VGs_Active__c > Total_Purchased_VG_Count__c, (VGs_Active__c +CMs_Active__c + AGs_Active__c) / (VGs_Active__c + Total_Purchased_CM_Count__c + Total_Purchased_AG_Count__c), IF( AND( (Total_Purchased_VG_Count__c + Total_Purchased_CM_Count__c + Total_Purchased_AG_Count__c)!=0, OR(NOT(ISNULL(VGs_Active__c)),NOT(ISNULL(CMs_Active__c)),NOT(ISNULL(AGs_Active__c))) ), (VGs_Active__c +CMs_Active__c + AGs_Active__c) / (Total_Purchased_VG_Count__c + Total_Purchased_CM_Count__c + Total_Purchased_AG_Count__c),NULL )), IF( AND( ( Total_Purchased_CM_Count__c + Total_Purchased_AG_Count__c)!=0, OR(NOT(ISNULL(VGs_Active__c)),NOT(ISNULL(CMs_Active__c))) ), (CMs_Active__c + AGs_Active__c) / (Total_Purchased_CM_Count__c + Total_Purchased_AG_Count__c),NULL ) )
CustomField.label: Custom Active Hardware Calculation
